title: Josiah Finds the Book of the Law
summary: King Josiah begins to rule and later initiates repairs on the temple. During this, the Book of the Law is discovered. Upon hearing its contents, Josiah tears his clothes in sorrow and seeks God, prompting a prophecy of delayed judgment.

faq.question: What did Josiah do when he heard the Law?
faq.answer: He repented and humbled himself, seeking Godâ€™s guidance.

faq.question: What did the prophetess Huldah say?
faq.answer: That judgment would come to Judah, but Josiah would not see it during his life.
